title: Don't buy anything from XTRACOVER.COM, it's a scam site!
selftext: Bought a refurbished iPhone SE 1st gen for Rs.8799. Received a pair of Vim Bars.
comments: How do you come across such beautiful websites?
I know, should have been more careful. This post is in case if someone searches for more info on this website before buying on reddit.

koi naa kuch toh mila 

\*ab ja ke mummy ko dede
Based website ü§ó
You don't say...
They clean out your wallet and the utensils

Ngl bro, this one is on ya. Like you really fell for such a shady site over a deal that literally sounds as pure fkn scam?

And, you even paid 8k for this, tf man. You could get a decent Android smartphone in that price from Amazon.
I thought it was some new condum brand
Remember everyone. If it sounds too good to me true, it most likely is a scam.
Its an iPhone SE 1st gen 2016. The price of those go even lower. I already use a 12 mini, this was bought as a backup in case my main phone goes for service sometime.

Good lesson for op . He is one of those who fell for video with titles "  download gta 5 in Android at size of 2 MB " .
But still fk the scammers always . Our country is infamous for scamming around the world . But i believe the more the people will be wise ,the less scam will happen . 
I hope u learnt your lesson and maybe find a way to catch these scammers.

>XTRACOVER.COM

Its obvious just from the name.
Yeah
why do you want to visit these sites?

XTRACOVER  name gives away their creative knowledge. 
Also, just checked that their website has mixed reviews and some YouTuber has also did a review of their product (I didn‚Äôt watch it). By there are a lot of other red flags. 

OP, try getting in touch with their management. The idea is a crap but you don‚Äôt have any other options. But I can seen sh*t load of red flags just by searching them on Google. You get a lesson worth 8k which can save you 800k in future.

I mean it was obviously my mistake i didn't check anything on them just because i was looking for a cheap backup phone that i was not really planning on using. The price looked legit for a 7 year old phone model. But yes, lesson learnt.
8k sounds like a cheap lesson you got. Now you know that if something's too good to be true. It's not. Sad that you learned it the hard way.
Report on consumer court online
Got a lot of extra cover tho. As promised.
BAHAHAAHAHAHAHA
By using Xtracover.com you made a sillypoint.

I don't get this actually. Why do people buy such old iPhones? If you're not able to buy current gen iPhones please buy new Androids, they're way better value for money. Buying a 7 year old phone just because it's an iPhone is not a good purchase.
I'm actually surprised OP even got anything delivered. I would've thought these scam sites ghost customers soon after getting the money

the se costs 30k on flipkart, you seriusly expected a 60% discount on that? just google before making purchase on unknown website [https://www.google.com/search?q=is+xtracover+scam&sourceid=chrome](https://www.google.com/search?q=is+xtracover+scam&sourceid=chrome)
What the fuck is a ‚ÄúXTRACOVER.com‚Äù it looks like a porn site name Lol!
How did you fall for this after reading that name?
The site name is extra cover and you got a lot of extra covers. I don't see the problem here.
No one is foolish enough to buy from such sites.
Bruh, why does it have to be fucking Vim bars every single time. üò≠
But, OP did. So, "no one" part is thoroughly debunked by OP. ¬Ø\\\_(„ÉÑ)\_/¬Ø
Atleast you can wash away your tears
Chal bartan dhole ab.
Absolutely, perfect reasoning to post it online to save others from same shit. Specially, knowing full well ridicule you gonna face. That's brave. üëç
Bruh people don't even trust sites like Flipkart these days. Regardless, file a chargeback and file a formal complaint against the company.

But don‚Äôt we have an option to backtrack the money ? With whom OP did transaction from which source to which source money got transferred and even if it was some business account I mean obviously there must some kind of tracking present because banks are involved.
Reminds me of this [skit by CalebCity](https://youtu.be/IZ8X8_9fSE4)
Enjoy the vim bars.
Did that. Let's ee if they can do anything.
Noted üëç
Are to Amazon use karne ka na

I think this is the handiwork of courier partners. I also bought iphone SE 2 last week from XTRACOVER.COM for ‚Çπ10,000. Order was cash on delivery. Got a proper phone within a week. And there are no issues.
I bought SE2 for 10,000 last week and recieved the delivery.
How?
I bought it from the same website that the OP bought his iphone from. Except I got proper working mobile. XTRACOVER.COM
Why are they selling for 10k? Defective? Stolen?
All refurbished phones. But it was a perfect deal for me since I only needed an apple device to create apple tv account.
Huh ? ive  bought a P3 XL last year & a P4a a few months ago. Worked flawlessly both times
